OOC: What I mean is since the poll is now revealing I shouldn't bring 
Snowowl into the rpg I'll reveal the detail of how I planned to do it 
with my revision of Sunhawk's history:

On the day when Snoowl "died" she was badly wounded, but made a 
miraculous recovery, but after she recovered and testified Sunhawk 
was innocent (Sunhawk was never told of this it was Top Secret) a 
decision was made.  The Concil of Elders would "arrange" for Sunhawk 
to escape so he'd go right after the Pred's who stole the files to 
clear his name.  He'd then be ready to give his life (I mean more so 
then usual) because he had nothing to loose.  This would make him the 
most dangerous agent the Council has.

Just wanted you to know what you thought, although I was going to 
somehow "arrange" for Snoowl to come to Earth I guess that story is 
null and void.
